n: Succulent Grilled Peaches with Honey Chevre
des: "The sweetness of the warmed peach goes so well with the creaminess of the goat cheese with a hint of honey. It's like getting cheesecake in a peach crust. "
ins:
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat, and lightly oil the grate.
Combine chevre cheese, milk, and honey in a small bowl.
Grill the peaches cut sides down until peaches begin to caramelize and show grill marks, 5 to 7 minutes. Fill each peach half with 1 tablespoon of the cheese mixture. Garnish with a mint leaf, and serve warm.
